name: Bomberman (itch) (zubby)
description:
A two player game of Bomberman - player vs player - first one to lose all 3 lifes loses.

Controls: Player 1: Movement: WASD Place Bomb: C Player 2: Movement: Arrow Keys Player Bomb: k

Power Ups:

Shoes (The two 2 brown cuboids): Increase speed

Multi Bomb: Increase number of bombs you can place by 1

Dynamite: Increase bomb range (by 1 square)
